channel.title: Labs on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Labs on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Final Project
item.description: Final project to build a C application leveraging one or more open-source libraries.

item.title: Lab 1: Game of Life
item.description: Lab assignment to implement John Conway’s Game of Life as a C program.

item.title: Lab 2: Data compression
item.description: Lab assignment to implement a Huffman decoder using C to compress a data file.

item.title: lab01
item.description: Supporting files for a lab assignment to implement John Conway’s Game of Life as a C program. (This ZIP file contains: 3 .txt files, 3 .c files, and 1 .h file.)

item.title: lab01_sol
item.description: Solution files for a lab assignment to implement John Conway’s Game of Life as a C program. (This ZIP file contains: 1 .txt file, 1 .h file and 4 .c files.)

item.title: lab02
item.description: Supporting files for a lab assignment to implement a Huffman decoder using C to compress a data file. (This ZIP file contains: 4 .txt files and 2 .c files.)

item.title: Labs
